display.title: Programmed Circuits
description: Don't want to spend your circuits to select recipes?
By clicking the &&6Circuit Configuration Slot&&r in machines, you can create a &&bghost Programmed Circuit&&r.
This is a fake circuit that allows you to select a given configuration for recipes! There's no need to spend your circuits crafting &&bProgrammed Circuits&&r anymore.
&&dElectric Machines&&r and &&dItem Input Buses&&r will have a Ghost Circuit Slot.
&&l&&3Lore:&&r&&o This feature is originally from GTNH.

subtitle.text: Don't want to spend your circuits to select recipes?
